## Major Authentication Issues Resolved
✅ Fixed blank login page after successful sign-up
✅ Resolved login process failures after registration  
✅ Implemented proper email verification workflow
✅ Unified authentication system architecture

## Key Technical Changes

### 1. Authentication System Unification
- **CRITICAL**: Fixed dual authentication system conflict
- Replaced userService calls with AuthService/useAuthContext
- RegisterForm.tsx: Now uses `useAuthContext().signUp`
- LoginForm.tsx: Now uses `useAuthContext().signIn`

- Added `emailRedirectTo` parameter to registration flow
- Registration now shows "check your email" message instead of auto-redirect
- Implemented email confirmation detection with success feedback
- AuthPage.tsx: Added confirmation handling with `?confirmed=true`

### 3. Proper Registration Workflow
```
Registration → Email Confirmation Message → 
Email Link Click → Success Message → Login
```

### 4. User Experience Improvements
- Clear messaging at each authentication step
- Proper success/error state handling
- No more mysterious blank login pages
- Users now understand the email verification requirement

## Files Modified
- `src/components/auth/RegisterForm.tsx` - Unified auth + success messaging
- `src/components/auth/LoginForm.tsx` - Consistent auth context usage  
- `src/pages/AuthPage.tsx` - Email confirmation detection & feedback
- `src/services/auth/AuthService.ts` - Added email redirect configuration

## Production Impact
🚀 Resolves critical user onboarding failures at https://scientific-research.online/
📧 Users now receive verification emails and understand the process
🔒 Authentication flow now follows proper Supabase email confirmation workflow

Bash(touch .github/workflows/deploy.yml && cat > .github/workflows/deploy.yml << 'EOF'
name: Deploy to GitHub Pages

on:
  push:
    branches: [ main ]

permissions:
  contents: read
  pages: write
  id-token: write

concurrency:
  group: "pages"
  cancel-in-progress: false

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    
    steps:
    - uses: actions/checkout@v4
    
    - name: Setup Node.js
      uses: actions/setup-node@v4
      with:
        node-version: '20'
        cache: 'npm'
    
    - name: Install dependencies
      run: npm ci
    
    - name: Build project
      run: npm run build
      env:
        VITE_SUPABASE_URL: ${{ secrets.VITE_SUPABASE_URL }}
        VITE_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY: ${{ secrets.VITE_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY }}
    
    - name: Upload artifact
      uses: actions/upload-pages-artifact@v3
      with:
        path: ./dist
  
  deploy:
    needs: build
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    environment:
      name: github-pages
      url: ${{ steps.deployment.outputs.page_url }}
    
    steps:
    - name: Deploy to GitHub Pages
      id: deployment
      uses: actions/deploy-pages@v4
EOF)
